sentences.english: That’s one thing I love about cottage living.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我喜歡小屋生活的原因之一。

sentences.english: Looking at the sky, I am just like a lonely little house slightly stand on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 仰望天空，我只是地平線上一座孤獨平微的小屋。

sentences.english: They topped off the hut with a straw thatch.
sentences.chinese: 他們給小屋蓋上茅草屋頂。

sentences.english: The house is built on mountains, and in accordance with the level terrain formed a patchwork pattern.
sentences.chinese: 小屋依山而建，並依地勢高低形成了錯落有致的格局。

sentences.english: Adema cradles his one year old daughter in his arms, as he stands outside his hut.
sentences.chinese: 阿迪馬抱着他一歲的女兒，站在簡陋小屋的外邊。

sentences.english: Qiuqiu spent more time in the hut of Granny Yinjiao.
sentences.chinese: 秋秋往銀嬌奶奶的小屋跑得更勤了。

sentences.english: Love can turn cottage into a golden palace .
sentences.chinese: 愛能使小屋變成黃金殿。

sentences.english: The north wind howled around our cabin.
sentences.chinese: 朔風在我們小屋周圍怒號。

sentences.english: To him it became something between a playroom and a church.
sentences.chinese: 對他而言小屋成了一個介於遊戲室和教堂的地方。

sentences.english: Joan sprained foot of all assistance, whole change, rental cottage to all the tiantai.
sentences.chinese: 瓊扭傷腳得全協助，對全改觀，出租天台小屋給全。

sentences.english: He continues collaborating with Dorothea on the cottages according to her plans.
sentences.chinese: 他繼續與多蘿西婭的小屋根據她的計劃。

sentences.english: You have to go back to the cabin and phone for help.
sentences.chinese: 你得回小屋打電話叫人來幫忙。

sentences.english: Each cabin has a large eucalyptus globulus wood beds and swimming pools.
sentences.chinese: 每間小屋都有桉木的大牀和游泳池。

sentences.english: It's impossible to pack so many people into the small room.
One of the first humor rooms was established at St. Joseph's Hospital in Houston.
sentences.chinese: 休斯敦聖約瑟夫醫院是最先建立幽默小屋的醫院之一。
